main.name: Chethan Mysuru Radhakrishna
main.description: Pursuing Master's in Data and Knowledge Engineering | Web Developer
main.bio: I am a data science enthusiast with an inclination towards visual exploration of trends in data. I am also a skilled web developer with a collective experience of 4 years. However, I believe in the idea that "What we know is a drop and what we don’t know is an ocean".

resume.skillmessage: I have been using react.js, bootstrap, CSS, HTML, SQL, C# and ASP .NET Web API's for the last 4 years and I am confident in these technologies (.NET-react stack). Lately, I have been working on reSolve, a full stack javascript framework built on node.js, CQRS and Domain Driven Design. I am a quick learner and I have been learning R and Python since 2019 and I have worked on a scientific team project where I developed R API's to dynamically visualize trends in data along with a react.js dashboard.

education.degree: M.Sc. in Data and Knowledge Engineering
education.description: I have been keen on learning fundamentals of data science and have completed courses like Machine Learning, Data Mining, Visual Analytics, Introduction to Deep Learning, Digital Humanities and Knwoledge Engineering. I have also done several data management courses like Distributed Data Management, Data Management for Engineering Applications, Advanced Data Models

education.degree: B.E. in Computer Science and Engineering

work.title: Software Developer - Student Job
work.description: Working as a full stack web developer. Handled API integration with react-redux dashboards. worked on real time data using web sockets. worked on event sourcing and reSolve(a CQRS framework built using node.js). Managed Gitlab pipeline and docker configurations with yaml.

work.title: Software Engineer
work.description: Contributed as a full stack web developer. Worked on ASP.NET MVC applications and Web API services built on .NET framework 4.6.2 and .NET core. Worked on react.js and redux to implement stateful frontend designs. Worked exclusively on Health Care domain with the knowledge of online data exchange standards such as HL7. Worked on AWS EC2, S3 buckets, Simple Mail Service and Lambda(for deploying micro services). As a billable resource, interacted with clients to understand requirements and effectively communicated the innovative ideas to solve their problems.

projects.title: Ship Cohort Study
projects.category: A longitudinal cohort study of Hepatic Steatosis(Fatty Liver Disorder) and exploration of results by developing a visual exploration tool.

projects.title: Gesture Recognition App
projects.category: An interactive WPF application to recognize hand gestures made by authorized users who are authenticated using face recognition.
